messages.subject: Translation of Wakayama
messages.msgSnippet: Good day!  If there is a board member who reads Japanese and has Toso Kodogu Meiji Taikei I need a translation of Vol. II, pg. 36, upper right.  It is a mei,
messages.messageBody:
Good day! If there is a board member who reads Japanese and has Toso
Kodogu Meiji Taikei I need a translation of Vol. II, pg. 36, upper
right. It is a mei, two kanji and kao, of Nagatsune but it would help
greatly to know what the descriptive is. Thank you very much.
Pete Klein
Ft. Lauderdale

PS: I need a scanner!
